snippet.title: Mystic Code (EN) Trailer :: 미스틱 코드 영문 트레일러
snippet.description:
✨DOWNLOAD NOW✨
🎮 AOS : http://1004.link/xo0xA
🎮 iOS :  http://1004.link/JvNBK


What is the truth that you will face?
Become a Mystic investigator and chase the criminal's shadow. 
Mystery Female Attraction Simulation - Mystic Code!

🦊 Story 🦊 
A strange being 'Mystic' that has the same shape as a human being but has the characteristics of animals and plants.
In a world where humans and "Mystic" coexist, there's an unprecedented murder!

The victim is a police officer and a gold-willed mastic.
We're all dead at the scene.
 
What did the unsub want to say?

The case goes to the Mystic Crime Team.
They search for past unsolved cases that may have been dealt with lightly.

The connection of cases that are only visible in the eyes of 'Mystic'.
A keen sense of intuition follows the criminal!
🔎 Mystery Visual Novel, Mystic Code


✨For more information
Twitter | https://twitter.com/lucydreamgame
Facebook | https://www.facebook.com/lucydreamgames
